sentence.Network_en: The desire to be a mother may creep up on you unexpectedly.
sentence.Network_cn: 你会不知不觉地产生想当母亲的渴望。

sentence.Network_en: Miserable, and unexpectedly lonely, she went in search of Jean-Paul.
sentence.Network_cn: 内心痛苦、突感寂寞的她去寻找琼－保罗。

sentence.Network_en: She panics when people pop in unexpectedly, rushing round plumping cushions.
sentence.Network_cn: 一群人冷不防地冒出来，跑来跑去地拍松垫子，这把她吓坏了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 可没想到(Unexpectedly)巴萨球迷闲居的业余活动照旧很满盈的，也学会(Learn)亲切起人家(Other people)的后院了？人要有三平心态…

字典中至字的解释 ... (5) 一定;必[ certainly] (6) 竟,竟然[ unexpectedly] (1) 夏至、冬至的简称[ solstice].
出字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 出航〖 setoutonavoyage〗 出乎意料〖 unexpectedly;outoftheblue〗 出活〖 yieldresultsinwork〗.

list.abs: 包含天... ... ◆ 春天[  spring ] ◆ 从天而降[ very unexpectedly ] ◆ 打天下[  seize state power;conquer the country ].
打的英语翻译，打用英文怎么说 - n词酷在线词典 ... (from ship) 登陆 (arrive unexpectedly) 不期而至 (discover) 发现.

entry.tran: 想不到的；未预料到的；意外的
entry.def: If an event or someone's behaviour is unexpected, it surprises you because you did not think that it was likely to happen.

example.tran: 他的死亡完全出乎意料。

example.ex: He made a brief, unexpected appearance at the office...
example.tran: 他出乎意料地在办公室露了一下脸。

means.word_mean: 1. in a way that was not expected;

sentences.sentence: "her brother showed up at the wedding out of the blue"

auth_sentence.content: Suddenly, it jackknifes into an unexpectedly poppy chorus.
auth_sentence.res_content: Suddenly, it jackknifes into an unexpectedly poppy chorus.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Suddenly, it jackknifes into an unexpectedly poppy chorus.

auth_sentence.content: Coming unexpectedly from a back parlour into the shop.
auth_sentence.res_content: Coming unexpectedly from a back parlour into the shop.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Coming unexpectedly from a back parlour into the shop.

auth_sentence.content: Last year, he unexpectedly quit the Royal Ballet.
auth_sentence.res_content: Last year, he unexpectedly quit the Royal Ballet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Last year, he unexpectedly quit the Royal Ballet.

sentences.en: Having to pay out unexpectedly for car repairs made a big hole in my savings.
sentences.cn: 因为修车而意外花了一笔钱,我的存款减少了许多。

sentences.en: He found he had struck it rich when he unexpectedly inherited some money from his aunt.
sentences.cn: 当他意外地从他姑妈那儿继承了一大笔钱时,他发现自己已经发大财了。

sentences.en: I had just put the dinner on when Jim walked in unexpectedly.
sentences.cn: 我刚把晚饭摆上桌,吉姆突然走进来。

sentences.en: Quite unexpectedly he turned on his heel and walked out of the door.
sentences.cn: 真没想到,他转身就走出了大门。
她的去世相当出人意料。
